data.message: Did you bang Rihanna while in studio? If no, why not?

replies.message:
Why your flow is fucking shitty now? Why did you make this trash song called The Monster? And why aint you working on Relapse 2? Relapse is a genius album bruh bruh. 
Will you make another album produced entirely by Dr Dre?
also im sick of all these cocksucking mainstream fans of yours..

Why your flow is fucking shitty now? Why did you make this trash song called The Monster? And why aint you working on Relapse 2? Relapse is a genius album bruh bruh. 
Will you make another album produced entirely by Dr Dre?
